title: Bodhiartistry Bodhiseed 108 Beads Healing Mala for Meditation- Mindfulness & Gratitude
features: This beautiful yet simple meditation mala is made up of 108 Bodhi Seed beads and 1 guru bead, handmade in Nepal.

Be Present: Its aromatic scent is a gentle reminder to be present and practice mindfulness and gratitude. Using mala to practice mindfulness and meditation is beneficial for your overall health. These practices teach us to train negative thoughts and subsequent feelings to not creep in and take attention to details. In shifting focus or dristi onto present, we then allow room for contentment and peace.
This mala is gender neutral and can be worn as a necklace or wrap it around the wrist. Its simple design will blend in with any of your fashion style.

Meditation Using Mala: First set your intention for practice. Choose a spot and sit comfortably with your spine straight and eyes closed. Take few deep breath and use mantra if you have one aloud or silently. Hold your mala on your hand of choice, draped between your middle and index finger. Starting at guru bead, use your thumb to count each smaller bead pulling it toward you as you recite your mantra. Do this 108 times, traveling around the mala until you once again reach guru bead.
This mala is perfect to gift your family, friends and loved ones expressing your best intentions.
description: This is a beautiful Bodhi Seed 108 beads mala for meditation. It has gender neutral design that can blend into your fashion style. This beautiful natural mala's intention is to remind us to practice mindfulness and gratitude daily and to choose kindness.
